rooms.description: North-facing entrance with Vastu-compliant entryway leading into the living area.
Spacious living room adjacent to the courtyard for natural light and ventilation.
Dining space with open views of the central courtyard.
Functional kitchen designed for efficiency with ample counter and storage space.
Master bedroom with attached private bathroom; north-facing to enhance energy flow according to Vastu.
Additional bedroom with built-in closet and window for natural light.
Third bedroom ensuring privacy and comfort; designed following local norms.
Fourth bedroom with open design for family gatherings or guest space.
Dedicated private gym area featuring industrial finishes and ample space for workout equipment.

openings.details: Main entrance door with secure access and Vastu-aligned design.
Large windows to allow ample natural light while maintaining privacy.
Ventilated window for kitchen exhaust systems as per local building codes.
Open courtyard area fostering natural light and ventilation, acting as a communal space.
